divs: sighting detailsi was staying at hilton hotel in big island. at evening of 09\07 around 9:20 i went out on my hotel room balcony to see surrounding view and stars.night sky was clearand fool of stars. after couple sec. of watching night sky i observed "blinking star". that star blinked every 12 sec or 24 sec. after 5 - 10 min i realized that "blinking star" is stationary.all background stars was moving except that blinking one.i took my camera and tripod , i change lens to 7-300 mm. next i set up my equipment end took 15 pictures on bulb time.after 18 min of taking pictures objet fade out for my eyes.on last picture on zoomed area i think is still present but i couldn't see that through my eyes. one of stars in background is dabih. http:\\stars.astro.illinois.edu\sow\dabih.html
